comment.p: Neo-Geo, CPS-1, CPS-2, ZN-1, ZN-2 and Sega Model 2 sound player

revision.comment: Updated the Sega Model 2 games (plus 7 added).
Added some of the new games for v2.7.
Updated to match MAME v0.63.
Added Sega Model 2 games for Nebula Jukebox v2.5.
Added 1944 and changed batcira->batcir.
Updated to match MAME v0.62.
Trivial cosmetic changes.

Added orlegend, kov, mslug4, neonopon, jgokushi, progear, puzloop2.
Renamed gwingj->gwing, rckman2j->megaman2, kof2001b->kof2001.
Fixed V2 ROM in Savage Reign.
Updated to match MAME v0.60.
Added Bang Bead and KOF2001.
Updated psyforce to match Zinc v0.8.
Updated for Nebula Jukebox v2.1 (added bucky and moo).
Updated to use standard ROM names (MAME v0.59 and Zinc v0.5).
Updated for Nebula Jukebox v2.0a.
Updated kof2000 to match MAME v0.58.
Updated kof2000 and mslug3.
Changed v2 in mslug3.

Updated for Nebula Jukebox v1.62 (added nitd, s1945p and sengoku3).
Changed kof99, kof2000, alpham2 and ganryu to use standard ROM names.
Updated for Nebula Jukebox v1.61 (added mslug3 and rckmanj).
First release.
